statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interaction WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, behavior_description FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, behavior_description FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, behavior_description FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY customer_id, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' AND behavior_description LIKE '%rude%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type IN ('Compliment', 'Query') ORDER BY interaction_type DESC, interaction_date;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age < 25
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customers_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customers_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name
SELECT behavior_date, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior
SELECT * FROM customers_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.interaction_date, m.strategy_name FROM customers_interactions c JOIN marketing_strategies m ON c.interaction_type = m.strategy_name ORDER BY c.interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date, notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.product_name, purchases.amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.amount > 100
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE INTERACTION_TYPE = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
